[#soil-compound-pedality_result-value]
====== Result value

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:soil-soil-pit-characterization-protocol-shapes:soil-compound-pedality:result-value`
|Label | Result value
|Definition | The value of `rdf:value` _MUST_ exist in the Soils structure compound pedalities codes controlled vocabulary.
|Comment | The value in `sosa:hasResult` _MUST_ be a value in `sh:in`, which is the Soils structure compound pedalities codes controlled vocabulary.
include::../../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`

|Property | Value
|Controlled list items | The result value MUST be from the following list: 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/7cf51bf8-6207-5214-b9a2-51c06e0ab1a5[`Largest peds (in the type of soil observation described), parting to`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/1a87385a-954f-590d-8549-05d73808ce00[`Next size peds, ... and further, if required, to the primary ped.`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/a541a8fa-ca74-54f1-8881-cb52151a3cba[`Next size peds, parting to`] 


|Source | TERN Ecosystem Surveillance Ecological Monitoring Protocols
